1462200.name: Speyarranoth
1462200.description: Speyarranoth is a classic sci-fi space asteroid shooter in 3D. You control the game using WASD and shoot with the space key. Effects include explosions, lasers, sound effects and background music. The game is made for desktop in Unity with the good graphics pipeline, named HDRP: High Definition Rendering Pipeline. The game's current incarnation is an early prototype and will be released in Early Access.
1462200.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
